import React from "react"; import "../assets/styles/App.css"; import "../assets/styles/style_IkBenArts.css"; import Header from "../components/Header"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; class IkBenArts extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { voornaam: "" }; } componentDidMount() { document.title = "Ik ben arts - Huur een arts"; } loadImage(event) { var image = document.getElementById("output"); var icon = document.getElementById("userIcon"); image.src = URL.createObjectURL(event.target.files[0]); icon.parentNode.removeChild(icon); } handleChange = event => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); }; render() { return (
